en.title: Testimonial Of Alisa Simms, Singer, Queen Of Chicago Soul.
en.content:
The Quantum Pendant works great! I had so much energy today and usually by 11am. I'm nodding off at my computer but not today I was a live wire. I was able to work out much longer than I normally do which is only 30 minutes (today did 1 1/2 hour). Thank you so very much, I have been telling people at work about it and they are interested in purchasing one. Will need to talk with you more about that business opportunity.

As for my girlfriend she is just amazed that her knees have not been hurting like they normally do. She hasn't felt relief in two years. She called me again today to say that she could't believe her knees really have stop hurting. Which is a good sign. I don't have any aliments that I know of but I can truly say it is doing something because my energy feels positive and different. Again many thanks!

PS Can't wait to share this with my mom... Cheers! 

- Alisa Simms, Singer, Queen of Chicago Soul.
